title: Oya Niwa Naisho no Koimonogatari
original_name: 親にはナイショの恋物語
sinopse:
An anthology of short stories.

1. Shinayaka ni Kizutsuite (Hurt Me Gracefully) [Kitagawa Miyuki]: this is the first chapter of Shinayaka ni Kizutsuite.
2. Devil Cat's Temptation by [Nakahara Migiwa]

3. Takaya-kun of House Tanaka [Shimaki Ako]

4. Story of a Long, Long Night [Yoshinaga Noriko]

(Source: MU)
